Detailed Description

Describes one road, that is a collection of street segments.

Member Function Documentation

uint32 StreetItem::getItemInPolygon (  uint16  polyIdx  )  const
 

Get the lowest item id present in the specified polygon.

Look up the item in the map, and check it's properties in order to know what the properties for that polygon is.

Parameters:
polyIdx The polygon index.
Returns:
The item id if valid polygon, otherwise MAX_UINT32.

Definition at line 103 of file StreetItem.h.

ItemTypes::roadClass StreetItem::getRoadClassForPolygon (  uint16  polyIdx  )  const [inline]
 

Get the roadclass for the specified polygon.

The caller of this method must make sure the indata is valid. This method relies on that the zoomlevel a ssi reflects the roadclass.

Parameters:
polyIdx The polygon index.
Returns:
The roadclass of that polygon.

Definition at line 74 of file StreetItem.h.

Member Data Documentation

uint16* StreetItem::m_itemOffsetForPolygon [protected]
 

Array which can be used to find the properties of a certain polygon (such as, the roadclass, is it a ramp, roundabout...

etc) It has the same size as the number of polygons in the street. Index i corresponds to the i:th index in itemsInGroup member. In order to know what the properties of polygon i is, lookup itemsInGroup[m_itemOffsetForPolygon[i]] in the map. The properties of that streetsegment item will be the same as the properties for that polygon.

Definition at line 87 of file StreetItem.h.

Referenced by getRoadClassForPolygon().
